info.titleen: Do you want us to cancel the order?
info.descko: 주문한 책이 2주나 늦어진다는 연락을 받은 그녀는 주문을 취소했을까요?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: Hi, Ms. Blane. This is Connor's Bookstore.
sentense.en_: Hi, Ms. Blane. This is Connor's Bookstore.
sentense.ko: 블래인 양 안녕하세요. 여기는 캐너 서점입니다.

sentense.en: Oh, hi. Did the book I ordered come in?
sentense.en_: Oh, hi. Did the book I ordered come in?
sentense.ko: 아, 안녕하세요. 제가 주문한 책이 왔어요?

sentense.en: That's why I'm calling. We've just received a message from the publishing company.
sentense.en_: That's why I'm calling. We've just received a message from the publishing company.
sentense.ko: 그것 때문에 전화드렸어요. 출판사에서 방금 메시지를 받았어요.

sentense.en: There will be a delay on your order.
sentense.en_: There will be a delay on your order.

sentense.en: Oh, no. I need it for a paper I'm writing.
sentense.en_: Oh, no. I need it for a paper I'm writing.
sentense.ko: 아, 안됩니다. 지금 쓰고 있는 논문을 위해 필요합니다.

sentense.en: I'm afraid it will be another two weeks before it's available.
sentense.en_: I'm afraid it will be another two weeks before it's available.
sentense.ko: 도착하기까지는 앞으로도 2주는 있어야 할 것으로 생각됩니다.

sentense.en: What would you like us to do? Do you want us to cancel the order?
sentense.en_: What would you like us to do? Do you want us to cancel the order?
sentense.ko: 어떻게 하면 되겠습니까? 주문을 취소하길 원하세요?

sentense.en: Well, I really want the book, so I'll wait for it.
sentense.en_: Well, I really want the book, so I'll wait for it.
sentense.ko: 음, 난 그 책이 꼭 필요해요, 그러니까 기다릴게요.
